column6: was sentenced to life in prison under Article 200 of the Penal Code (premeditated murder)
column7: and ordered to pay civil reimbursement of 120 million riels ($30
column8: 000) by the Phnom Penh Court on the morning on December 31. ------The woman was found guilty of killing Kim Yana
column10: after she couldn’t pay back a debt to the victim.------The body was then ------dismembered inside Alamo Cafe------ and thrown in pieces into the river.
